example.description:
PubChem Case 1:

What protein targets does donepezil (CHEBI_53289) inhibit with an IC50 less than 10 µM?

PubChem Case 2:

What pharmacological roles of SID46505803 are defined by ChEBI?
example.code: SELECT DISTINCT ?rolelabel FROM pubchem:substance FROM pubchem:compound FROM pubchem:ontology WHERE { substance:SID46505803 sio:CHEMINF_000477 ?comp. ?comp rdf:type ?chebi. ?chebi rdfs:subClassOf [ a owl:Restriction; owl:onProperty obo:RO_0000087; owl:someValuesFrom ?role ]. ?role rdfs:label ?rolelabel. }

example.description:
PubChem Case 3:

What compound have a pharmacological role of NSAID as defined by ChEBI and molecular weight less than 200 g/mol?
example.code:
SELECT DISTINCT ?compound FROM pubchem:compound FROM pubchem:ontology FROM descriptor:compound WHERE { ?compound rdf:type ?chebi. ?chebi rdfs:subClassOf [ a owl:Restriction; owl:onProperty obo:RO_0000087; owl:someValuesFrom obo:CHEBI_35475 ]. ?compound sio:has-attribute ?MW. ?MW rdf:type sio:CHEMINF_000334. ?MW sio:has-value ?MWValue.
filter (?MWValue < 200) }

example.description:
PubChem Case 4:

What substances have a pharmacological role of NSAID as defined by ChEBI and the depositor-provided chemical vendor information?
example.code: SELECT DISTINCT ?substance ?source FROM pubchem:substance FROM pubchem:source FROM pubchem:ontology WHERE { ?substance dcterms:source ?source. ?source dcterms:subject concept:Chemical_Vendors. ?substance rdf:type ?chebi. ?chebi rdfs:subClassOf [ a owl:Restriction; owl:onProperty obo:RO_0000087; owl:someValuesFrom obo:CHEBI_35475 ]. }

example.description:
PubChem Case 5:

What protein targets are inhibited by substances with an IC50 less than 10 µM and have a pharmacological role of cholinesterase inhibitors as defined by ChEBI?

PubChem Case 6:

Which substances inhibit protein targets similar to GI129900 and have the function domain PSSMID188648?
example.code: SELECT DISTINCT ?substance ?protein ?value FROM pubchem:substance FROM pubchem:measuregroup FROM pubchem:endpoint FROM pubchem:protein FROM pubchem:conserveddomain WHERE { ?substance obo:BFO_0000056 ?measuregroup. ?measuregroup obo:BFO_0000057 ?protein. protein:GI129900 vocab:hasSimilarProtein ?protein. ?protein obo:BFO_0000110 conserveddomain:PSSMID188648. ?measuregroup obo:OBI_0000299 ?endpoint. ?endpoint obo:IAO_0000136 ?substance. ?endpoint rdf:type bao:BAO_0000190. ?endpoint sio:has-value ?value. }

example.description:
PubChem Case 7:

What protein targets are inhibited by substances with IC50 less than 10 µM and have the same standardized chemical structure (CID3152)?

PubChem Case 8:

What substances inhibit the proteins involved in the same biological pathway: prostaglandin biosynthetic process (GO_0001516), with an IC50 less than 10 µM?
example.code:
SELECT DISTINCT ?substance ?protein FROM pubchem:substance FROM pubchem:measuregroup FROM pubchem:endpoint FROM pubchem:protein FROM pubchem:biosystem WHERE { ?substance obo:BFO_0000056 ?measuregroup. ?measuregroup obo:BFO_0000057 ?protein. ?protein rdf:type bp:Protein. ?protein obo:BFO_0000056 obo:GO_0001516. ?measuregroup obo:OBI_0000299 ?endpoint. ?endpoint obo:IAO_0000136 ?substance. ?endpoint rdf:type bao:BAO_0000190. ?endpoint sio:has-value ?value.
filter (?value < 10) }

example.description:
PubChem Case 9:

What the pharmacological roles defined by ChEBI are for the substances that inhibit protein target GI17531135 with an IC50 less than 10 µM?

PubChem Case 10:

Summarize the statistics about the total number of substances tested in the PubChem database against each protein target.
example.code: SELECT (count(?sub) as ?subcnt) ?protein FROM pubchem:substance FROM pubchem:measuregroup FROM pubchem:endpoint FROM pubchem:protein WHERE { ?sub obo:BFO_0000056 ?mg. ?mg obo:BFO_0000057 ?protein. ?protein rdf:type bp:Protein. ?mg obo:OBI_0000299 ?ep. ?ep rdf:type bao:BAO_0000190; obo:IAO_0000136 ?sub; sio:has-value ?value. } GROUP BY ?protein ORDER BY DESC(count(?sub))
